ability.title: Intimidating Pattern
ability.content: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks do 30 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

power.title: Venomous Fang
power.content: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

ability.title: Sooth Dust
ability.content: As long as Butterfree is your Active Pokémon, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon between turns.

power.title: Whirlwind
power.content: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

ability.title: Intimidating Pattern
ability.content: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks do 20 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

power.title: Fire Fang
power.content: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

ability.content: his attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

power.title: Thundershock
power.content: he Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

ability.title: Little Grudge
ability.content: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack, discard an Energy attached to the Attacking Pokémon..

power.title: Nightmare
power.content: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

ability.title: Dragon Crush
ability.content: This attack does 10 damage to each Defending Pokémon. Discard an Energy card from each Defending Pokémon.

power.title: Aqua Sonic
power.content: This attack's damage is not affected by Resistance.

ability.title: Victory Kiss
ability.content: If this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may heal 10 damage from your Active Pokémon..

power.title: Freeze Light
power.content: Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed or the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

ability.title: Blow-Away Bomb
ability.content: Once during your turn, when you discard this Pokémon with the effect of Roxie, you may put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Place damage counters after the effect of Roxie.)

power.title: Poison Gas
power.content: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

ability.title: Snatch and Run
ability.content: Search your deck for a Pokémon Tool card or Rocket's Secret Machine card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. If you do, you may switch Rocket's Meowth with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

power.title: Miraculous Comeback
power.content: This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads. Rocket's Meowth does 10 damage times the number of tails to itself.

ability.title: X Ball
ability.content: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to this Pokémon and the Defending Pokémon.

power.title: Transfer Break
power.content: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

ability.title: Vengeance
ability.content: This attack does 20 more damage for each Pokémon in your discard pile. You can't add more than 180 damage in this way.

power.title: Sharp Claws
power.content: Your opponent's looses 60 more damage..

ability.title: Clutch
ability.content: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

power.title: Strong Gust
power.content: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.

ability.title: Recharge
ability.content: Energy card and attach it to Pikachu. Shuffle your deck afterward.

power.title: Thunderbolt
power.content: Discard all Energy attached to Pikachu.

ability.title: Mega Throw
ability.content: If the Defending Pokémon is Pokémon-ex, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

power.title: Split Spiral Punch

ability.content: Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

power.title: Confuse Ray
power.content: Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

ability.title: Steaming Mad
